mapper.insert: insert into hotplace (content_id, favorite_cnt, user_id) values(#{content_id}, 1, #{user_id});
mapper.select: select id from users where user_id = #{user_id}
select gugun_code from guguns where sido_code = #{sido_code}
select tp.* from travel_plans tp join ( select plan_id, COUNT(*) as plan_count from plans_favorites group by plan_id ) pf_grouped on tp.id = pf_grouped.plan_id order by pf_grouped.plan_count desc;

select at.* from attractions at join ( select content_id, COUNT(*) as hotplace_count from hotplace group by content_id ) hp_grouped on at.content_id = hp_grouped.content_id order by hp_grouped.hotplace_count desc;
